column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Our experience at Bavette's was exceptional! Our waitperson
column4: giving us many excellent suggestions for menu options. A very ebullient and knowledgeable individual who shared his passion with us. We spent Â over 4 hrs. conversing
column5: imbibing and dining. Fantastic! Just some of the dishes we had...The lamb chops were cooked to perfection
column6: the lyonnaise salad was delicious and the salted caramel ice cream was to die for! I can't remember the last time that I have had such a wonderful restaurant experience. Thank you to Shawn and to Brandon.
